channel.title: Get rid of the srl appliance section
channel.description: We aren't SRL anymore so there is no need. Also the old applications that were accept are deleted so its not like there is an archive there.

item.title: Get rid of the srl appliance section
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

exe626:

Combine the Scar and SRL sections together then. Basically the same thing, they work with each other anyways. But if you all are so tired of seeing them, like Mopar said, why don’t you just minimize them?

Great ideas. oh wait everyone has said basically the same thing. so any actions?

Read full topic

item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

ninja nub:

it’s funny when noobs post things like ‘How do I connect to a server?’

No its not.

I see no activity in the SRL boards, but its a piece of history. Keep it.

Just the off-topicers. Makes me lol.

but since that isn’t my idea, we are fine.

item.title: Get rid of the srl appliance section
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

IBot is better, but it is pay, and most of the free scripts simply suck. There isn’t as good of a fanbase either. The free version is bloated and purposefully crippled.

Read full topic

item.title: Get rid of the srl appliance section
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

i am having trouble bringing myself to say this, but ruler’s ibot is better than scar. scar is bad, if you think it is a good cheat (for runescape) you need your head checked

Read full topic
item.source: Get rid of the srl appliance section

item.title: Get rid of the srl appliance section
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The appliance section can be removed, we will see about the rest of it at a later date.

As to the sarcastic remarks about ‘just remove all of the SCAR stuff’ SCAR is the best and longest running public cheat so far, if you don’t want to use it don’t. If you don’t want to see the section(s) minimize them, but other people do use it so leave them alone.

Read full topic
item.source: Get rid of the srl appliance section

item.title: Get rid of the srl appliance section
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:25, topic:154736”]Just delete SRL. I’d prefer if SCAR went altogether but lots of people still use it.

I have most sections of the board minimised anyway,[/quote]
Perhaps we should just delete the internetz.

Read full topic
item.source: Get rid of the srl appliance section

item.title: Get rid of the srl appliance section
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

[quote=“wixter, post:29, topic:154736”][quote author=Silver Lining link=topic=211376.msg1849977#msg1849977 date=1193551337]
If we removed the SRL section, we must also delete all other useless sections. Therefore, the general section and “other” section would be gone. Wait, the entire forum would be gone.
[/quote]
How about we just delete you seens though you are useless?[/quote]To complement what sup000 said, when criticizing, give your reasons for your dissonance. Would the Russian Revolution have ever occurred had its participants only said “the Czarist reign is terrible”?

Read full topic
